structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text:
"Farmers of low income," as used in KRS 80.510 and 80.530, shall mean persons or families who at the time of their admission to occupancy in a dwelling of a housing authority:
Live under unsafe or unsanitary housing conditions;
Derive their principal income from operating or working upon a farm; and
Had an aggregate average annual net income for the three (3) years preceding their admission that was less than the amount determined by the housing authority to be necessary, within its area of operation, to enable them, without financial assistance, to obtain decent, safe and sanitary housing, without overcrowding.
